Description:
QUALITY STARTER OR INVESTMENT
Perfectly positioned close to Newcomb Shopping Village and with easy access to the Geelong CBD, this solid 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom brick home has so much to offer. Sitting on a 510m2 block, first home owners and investors alike are sure to be delighted.
The master bedroom features a walk through robe with direct access to the two way central bathroom, while the remaining two bedrooms both have built in robes.
With reverse cycle heating and cooling, along with Vulcan heating and a ceiling fan, the L-Shaped lounge with as new carpet offers year round comfort.
The neat kitchen includes a gas cooktop and gas wall oven, and the meals area features a glass sliding door that opens onto the large undercover outdoor pergola.
This lovingly cared for home boasts an immaculately maintained rear garden and double lock up garage.
This home will not stay on the market for long, so do not miss your opportunity to add to your rental portfolio or enter the real estate market. Call today for further information.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Solid entry level or investment opportunity.
This is a home not to be missed. Resting upon 553m2 (approx.) is this amazing property, ready for a first home buyer or a keen investor.
Offering a master bedroom that leads to a walk-in robe & ensuite, two additional bedrooms with a central bathroom & separate toilet. At the heart of the home is the open plan living, dining & updated kitchen presenting stainless steel cooking appliances. Extra features include, but are not limited to split system air-conditioning & automatic roller blinds.
Now, on to the exterior. You will find a well sized garage & backyard with an undercover area, perfect for entertainment all year round.
Ideally located, minutes away from the Newcomb Shopping Centre, Newcomb Secondary College, the Gordon East Geelong Campus, the Geelong CBD & walking distance to public transport. Its convenience will definitely leave a lasting impression for any homeowner or tenant.

Description:
Family Appeal With Endless Possibilities
Ready to turn the page on the next chapter in its life cycle, this brick home occupies an allotment of approximately 837 square metres. The level block offers exciting potential to renovate your vision of contemporary excellence replete with a magical alfresco zone or pool, subject of course to the necessary approval from council.
Once complete, your brand-new residence will stand within very short proximity of Newcomb Primary School, Christ the King Catholic primary, Newcomb Secondary & Grinter Reserve. Easy access is assured to the popular Bellarine Village, Newcomb Central Shopping Centre, the Bellarine Peninsula and the Geelong CBD & Waterfront.
Surrounded by a well-established garden, the traditional interior features an entrance hall opening to a formal living space, four bedrooms, updated bathroom with separate toilet. The also updated kitchen with meals area overlooks north-east facing rear yard. Other features include, double lock up garage, garden sheds, side access and drive through access to rear yard.
When it comes to easy and convenient living, this home has it all. So, whether you're a first homebuyer, investor, downsizer, or young family - place this home at the top of your list!

Description:
Calling Upon all Savvy Investors
This low maintenance unit, located within close distance to all amenities would make an ideal investment. Situated within walking distance to local shops, schools and just a short drive to the Geelong CBD. Comprising of one generous sized bedroom including built in robes, a central kitchen with adjacent living and meals room and a combined bathroom and laundry. Outside offers a secure yard and single carport.
Currently rented to an excellent, long-term tenant, paying $195 per week. This property would suit the first time or an astute investor with a view to the future and a keen eye for value. Dont miss out on your next investment!

Description:
Family Home with Entertainment & Convenience in Mind.
An immaculately presented 3 BR home, all with BIRs, master with WIR and en-suite. Features front formal and dining area with open fireplace, leading into the open plan kitchen, dining, 2nd living area with gas cook top, electric oven and dishwasher. Flowing out to outdoor alfresco area complete with built-in BBQ and 8-person spa, perfect for entertaining with all this overlooking a well manicured north facing landscaped garden. Add to this DBL lock-up garage, duct heating, RCAC, walking distance to shopping centres, public transport, primary & secondary schools. 5 mins from CBD and 10 mins from the Bellerine.

CALLING ALL INVESTORS OR FIRST HOME BUYERS
Located conveniently with easy access to the Bellarine and Geelong CBD this 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom, open living kitchen/dining/lounge property on 564m2 approx block has so much potential.
This solid home is the ideal addition to your rental portfolio. Also perfect for those wanting to get into the market this could be your first home.
Three good sized bedrooms, the master with walk in robe and direct access to the two way central bathroom with separate toilet.
The well-appointed serviceable kitchen has ample bench space and storage.
Comprising of DLUG, with further off street parking for 2 cars. A large undercover outdoor pergola along with the low maintenance garden.
This solid investment could potentially rent for $350 pw. Minutes from local schools, Newcomb Shopping Village, Splashdown Aquatic Centre and Geelong CBD.

Description:
Clean, convenient and close to everything!
This neat 2 bedroom unit on its own title would make an ideal downsizer, investment or inexpensive entry point into the Geelong real estate market. With off street parking for a large camper or boat it provides for a fantastic "Lock up and Leave" lifestyle. Located in a great part of Geelong offering easy access to the Bellarine, Surfcoast and Geelong centre it has a bus stop nearby and is only moments from schools and shops. Comprising 2 good sized bedrooms, large kitchen and separate open plan dining and lounge. Security shutters on windows and an internal security system provides peace of mind and comfort. Ceiling fans throughout and a near new gas wall furnace allows all year round climate control. Outside features a low maintenance garden with an undercover area and garden beds make this an easy living unit ready to go! With everything this property has to offer it will appeal to many so be quick to inspect as it won't last.

Description:
Single Level Living in Central Locale
Ideally located moments from the heart of thriving Bellarine Village & Newcomb Central this quality 2 bedroom abode, peacefully set with preferred rear position will appeal to astute first home buyers, downsizers and investors seeking low maintenance lifestyle advantages with blue chip credentials. Boasting a tasteful interior, the spacious floorplan comprises entrance hall leading to a sizeable north facing lounge and dining opening to light filled kitchen. Two robed bedrooms beside the immaculate bathroom and toilet. Outside, a private courtyard provides for alfresco enjoyment in a low maintenance setting. Further complements include single garage, laundry room with external access, gas heater, split system heating/cooling in an enviable location only a short walk to amenities, public transport and easy access to the Geelong CBD.

Description:
SOLID INVESTMENT OR FANTASTIC FIRST HOME
This impressive 3 bed, 2 bath weatherboard home set on 307m2 has everything you need and more! Set in quiet Regent St, this beautifully presented home would suit a first home buyer, savvy investor, downsizer or young couple.
Comprising of a neat entry, 2 good sized bedrooms at the front of the property, light and bright inside, good carpeting throughout, decorative cornices & tall ceilings enhancing space. Down the hallway to the left you will find a huge master bedroom with great storage.
The fantastic functional kitchen/meals area seating up to 6 is the hub of the home featuring great cupboard and bench space, equipped with a Westinghouse 4 burner electric cooktop and Bosch rangehood. At the rear of the house is the living area boasting a Panasonic cooling unit and large windows allowing in an abundance of natural light. Off the Living area are 2 bathrooms and a separate toilet.
Stepping outdoors from the living room you will find a generous courtyard with low maintenance garden and entertaining area. Ideally located only minutes from Shopping Centres, a short drive to East Geelong shops, Geelong CBD, Gordon Tafe and just a 5 minute walk to the bus stop.
* Braemar ducted heating
* Panasonic AC
* Rent $340 pw
* 307m2

Description:
A Quiet, Convenient and Comfortable place to live
The phone enquiry code for this property is - 0938
TO VIEW, phone any day between 11 AM and 5 PM
.
3 bedrooms, Lounge, Dinning, Kitchen, Bathroom, Laundry, Large Double Garage with Lighting Power and Water, Large Undercover Outdoor Area, plus a generous size fenced back yard.
For comfort, in the lounge there's a Reverse cycle split sytem air conditioner, ceiling fan and gas heating too. Plus two of the bedrooms have reverse cycle split system air cons also. All of the bedrooms are of a good size and have built-in robes.
For economy there's 16 North facing Solar panels on the roof.
Recent upgrades include; new gas stove and range hood, new reverse cycle air cons in two bedrooms and new thermal backed curtains throughout.
Situated in a small quiet court with very little traffic and great neighbors makes for a quiet, comfortable and convenient place to live.
Close to both Bellarine Highway Shopping Centers, public transport, Splash Down Aquatic Leisure Center and Creche, local primary and secondary schools, local library, local medical centers, The Bellarine Rail Trail, The Gordon (Tafe's East Geelong Campus) and only 5 to 10 minutes drive to Geelong CBD, Hospital, Waterfront, etc.
Brick and tile on slab construction, on a 570 m2 block (approx).
TO VIEW, phone any day between 11 AM and 5 PM.

Description:

Offered for the first time is this well maintained quality built Malishev home, lovingly cherished by its original owner the property is set on a substantial size block of approx 720sqm. Perfect for families to move straight into and enjoy, an exciting opportunity for first home buyers looking for an excellent affordable property or those investors searching to add a superb investment to their portfolio.
- Wide frontage of approx 18.44mts & depth 39.0, potential for 2nd dwelling (STCA)
- Extra wide side driveway to garage offering workshop space at rear
- Land approx 720sqm, secure rear yard backs onto Vincent Park
- Generous separate lounge room with gas heating & sliding doors to dining
- Decorative cornices & ceiling rose, tall windows enhance light and space
- Open plan dining & kitchen enjoys reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Kitchen features gas cooktop & stainless wall oven
- Three good size bedrooms all fitted with double built-in-robes
- Well-appointed family bathroom sep bath & shower, sep w/c
- Wide front verandah, convenient covered rear porch
- Extra open car space perfect storage for caravan/trailer/boat
- Close to shopping centres, good selection of schools & leisure facilities
- Bellarine Rail Trail around the Corner, Vincent Park at the rear of the property

Description:
Compact 2 bedroom unit - ideal investment, first home or downsizer - Central location, very neat and tidy.
An ideal 2 bedroom unit located in a quiet location offers the investor, first home buyer or downsize this rare opportunity to purchase such a neat & tidy unit.
Consisting of an open plan lounge and kitchen, separate bathroom with laundry facilities, separate toilet & two spacious bedrooms with BIRs. The rear court yard offers a north westerly aspect - ideal for entertaining or just pottering in the garden. The unit come with its own carport & is temperature controlled by a gas space heater & wall mounted air- conditioner. Access to the unit is from Regent Street &also has rear access for parking from Truscott Street - (please use google maps for the address).
Offering a quiet location in a central position with public transport available from Boundary Rd, close proximity to local shopping centres (Newcomb Central, Boundary Rd , Garden Street shops), schools & just a short drive to Geelong's CBD & waterfront district.

Description:
Unmissable The Perfect First Start, Family Home, Development site or Investment!
Home Owner Comment The location has been great, 5 minute drive to Geelong CBD & a 5 minute walk to shopping centres & schools!
With sun, space and period features, this stand-alone 1960s charming three-bedroom home offers convenience and comfort whilst nestled on a substantial block 727m2, a tremendous land offering with investment power. Giving plenty of scope to extend or subdivide and develop this sizeable block (STCA).
Just a 400-metre walk to local shopping centres, 5-minute walk to primary schools, secondary schools, the local library, day care, medical facilities and a short drive to Geelong CBD and bus stops a stones throw away this location delivers all your familys needs at your fingertips.
Offering a flexible floor plan with two of the three bedrooms include built in robes, large window space and ceiling fans in all rooms. The family bathroom is centrally located from the bedrooms and includes shower, separate bath and toilet.
Full of character whilst neatly renovated, the interior features beautiful polished floorboards throughout, a spacious and sunlit family living room that opens into the dining room. An updated kitchen equipped with all the necessities, an electric oven and cook top and walk in pantry. The sun-room creates the perfect space for a study or an extension opportunity.
Additional features include: Large laundry room, gas heating, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, high ceilings with art décor features, freshly painted throughout and a full roof restoration making this charming family abode ready to move in and enjoy today!
Fully fenced with a large driveway accommodating plenty of off-street parking, with side access to the large backyard.
If youre looking for a great opportunity, then take advantage of this well positioned property in the ever-growing suburb of Whittington. This bright and inviting property will feel like home from the moment you walk through the door.
Roncon Real Estate An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Huge block on (approx.) 1166m2.
Here is a great opportunity to secure this property with the potential to development and subdivide (STCA) or build a huge home with plenty of room for garaging.
Zoned GENERAL RESIDENTIAL ZONE (GRZ) GENERAL RESIDENTIAL ZONE - SCHEDULE 1 (GRZ 1) This property offers plenty of opportunity situated on a huge approx. 1166m2 allotment. Currently tenanted on a periodical lease and located just 10 mins to Geelong CBD, 8 minutes to South Geelong railway station, short walk to bus services , primary and secondary schools, Newcomb Shopping Centres and Gordon East Geelong campus.

Description:
Stylish Designer Living
This well located and attractive 2-bedroom unit presents a great opportunity for those seeking a modern low maintenance lifestyle or a stylish investment property. Offering 2 generous bedrooms with built in robes, bathroom, w/c and single R/C garage with internal access downstairs and large open plan kitchen/meals/family room upstairs leading out onto the balcony overlooking the park land. The sleek modern kitchen includes gas hot plates, electric oven, dishwasher, pantry and plenty of cupboard space, Year-round comfort is taken care of with the with split system heating and cooling unit. Currently leased at $290 per week till Jan 2020 this is a fantastic opportunity to add to your property portfolio. Located close to Newcomb Shopping Centres, schools and public transport and 10 minutes to Geelong CBD. Whether you're searching for your first home, downsizing or simply looking for your next investment this fantastic opportunity should not be overlooked.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
